snippet: The Democratic Republic of Congo and Rwanda sent more troops to their shared border on Thursday after gunfire briefly broke out for a second day.
abstract: Democratic Republic of Congo and Rwanda send more troops to shared border after gunfire briefly breaks out for second day.
lead_paragraph: The Democratic Republic of Congo and Rwanda sent more troops to their shared border on Thursday after gunfire briefly broke out for a second day.

headline.main: Congo: Troops Exchange Fire With Rwandan Soldiers
headline.print_headline: Congo: Troops Exchange Fire With Rwandan Soldiers
